channel.title: Notice board | Unimi
channel.description: General notice board of the University of Milan "La Statale"

item.title: University scholarships - Students enrolled in the first year of a master's degree programme
item.description: The following provisional ranking has been published a.y. 2023/2024:%0AUniversity scholarships - Students enrolled in the first year of a master's degree programme.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti. a.y. 2023/2024
item.description: For the academic year 2023/2024, the University is giving out three study awards (type A-B-C) in memory of Professor Clementina Gatti.%0AFor further information, check out the calls for applications on the dedicated pages.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Online survey to pinpoint sexual harassment on campus
item.description: The survey is open until 15 May 2024.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it

item.title: Applications for academic year 2024/2025
item.description: Applications to open-admission Master’s degree programmes for the academic year 2024/2025 are open from 22 January 2024.%0ANon-EU students VISA applicants can generally apply until 30 April 2024.%0AFor information, please visit the webpage Open admission master programmes.%0A %0A

item.title: CELI and CELI i exams - fees
item.description: Please find below the fees for CELI and CELI i exams.%0A%0A▶️ Learn more on Unimi.it
